meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Briefing on DCA190-002 Off-Street Parking & Loading Code Amendment
agenda_items.description: Consideration of amending Chapter 51 and 51A of the Dallas Development Code regarding minimum off-street parking and loading requirements, including establishing a Transportation Demand Management Plan and off-street parking design standards.

agenda_items.title: Public Hearing: Development Code Amendments - Under Advisement
agenda_items.description: Consideration of amending Chapters 51 and 51A of the Dallas City Code regarding off-street parking and loading requirements, including various sections and related amendments.

agenda_items.title: FY 2023-24 Annual Report
agenda_items.description: Presentation of the annual report for the City Plan Commission.
